articles.title: Congratulations to PM of Central Africa
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of Central Africa
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Mathieu Simplice Sarandji on his appointment as prime minister of the Central African Republic.
					 The message sincerely wished the prime minister big success in his work for the country's peace and development, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields.

articles.title: Congratulations to Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party
articles.content:
Congratulations to Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea sent a congratulatory message to the National Leadership of the Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party on Wednesday on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the party.
					 Wishing the Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party and Arab people fresh achievements in their struggle to defend the country's sovereignty, security and territorial integrity under the leadership of President Bashar Al-Assad, the message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the Workers' Party of Korea and the Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party would invariably grow stronger.

articles.title: U.S.-South Korea "Mutual Defense Treaty" Dismissed as Illegal
articles.content:
U.S.-South Korea "Mutual Defense Treaty" Dismissed as Illegal
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is advertising that its forces' occupation of south Korea and joint military exercises are "legal" as they are pursuant to the "mutual defense treaty" with south Korea and it is observing the Korean Armistice Agreement. 
					 A spokesman for the Disarmament and Peace Institute of the DPRK Foreign Ministry in a statement on Wednesday said this is sheer sophism and a crafty artifice to cover up the U.S. aggressive nature and mislead world public opinion.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea "mutual defense treaty" which the U.S. cites as a ground claiming the "legality" of the joint military drills, is an illegal document quite contrary to the Korean Armistice Agreement.
					
					 The AA stipulates the articles calling for holding a political conference within three months after the armistice agreement is signed and becomes effective and negotiating the questions of the withdrawal of all foreign forces from Korea and the peaceful settlement of the Korean question, etc.
					
					 However, the U.S. concluded the "mutual defense treaty" with the south Korean puppet forces before the period for convening the political conference stipulated in the AA.
					
					 The U.S. has persistently staged joint military drills aiming at the invasion against the DPRK with south Korean puppet forces after freezing its military occupation of south Korea in violation of the AA.
					
					 This is not only the total abrogation of the key paragraph of the armistice agreement which calls for insuring a complete cessation of hostilities and of all acts of armed force in Korea until a final peaceful settlement is achieved but an open declaration of a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. stands against the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty, an illegal act in wanton violation of not only the paragraph dealing with ensuring the peaceful settlement of the Korean question but also the purpose and principle of the UN Charter which calls for bringing about by peaceful means â€¦ adjustment or settlement of international disputes or situations which might lead to a breach of the peace.
					
					 The purpose sought by the U.S. is to keep the "mutual defence treaty" which it signed with the south Korean puppet forces and put the whole Korean peninsula under its control with the treaty as a legal ground and thus realize its hegemonic Asia-Pacific strategy.
					
					 The U.S. claims the arms buildup in south Korea and joint military exercises are also to protect the U.S. forces in case of contingency but it is just a far cry.
					
					 If the U.S. is truly concerned about damage to be done to its forces in case of a war on the peninsula, it can just withdraw them from south Korea.
					
					 The removal of cancer-like U.S. forces would create a peaceful environment as it would clear the Korean peninsula and the region of the source of war.
					
					 But at present there is no institutional mechanism for checking a thermonuclear war on the Korean peninsula and the U.S. nuclear threat to the DPRK is steadily increasing.
					
					 Under the prevailing situation the DPRK will further bolster its nuclear deterrence both qualitatively and quantitatively and exercise with dignity its right to self-defence as a sovereign state.
					
					 The statement said the U.S. reckless nuclear war exercises are a suicidal act little short of digging its own grave.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Honored in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Honored in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un was registered as the honorary national leader by the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary).
					 A ceremony took place in Abuja on March 31 to convey the certificate of honorary national leader to be presented to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Participants laid bouquets at the painting depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before paying homage to them.
					
					 At the ceremony Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria, conveyed the certificate to Jong Yong Chol, DPRK ambassador to Nigeria.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted there.

articles.title: Gifts to Peerlessly Great Persons of Mt. Paektu from Nigerian Personage
articles.content:
Gifts to Peerlessly Great Persons of Mt. Paektu from Nigerian Personage
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria presented gifts to President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung).
					 The gifts were conveyed to the DPRK ambassador to Nigeria by national chairman Damian Ogbonna on March 31.

articles.title: Teaching Materials to Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies from Romanian Embassy
articles.content:
Teaching Materials to Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies from Romanian Embassy
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The Romanian embassy here donated teaching materials to Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies.
					 Teaching materials were conveyed to an official of the university by Gheorghe Cioaca, charge d' affaires ad interim of the Romanian embassy, on Wednesday.
					
					 Prior to it, staff members of the embassy went round the room dedicated to the history of the university and various other places.

articles.title: National Photo Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Photo Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The national photo exhibition "Great Contribution to Defending Country and Loving People" was opened with due ceremony at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday to celebrate the fourth anniversary of the election of Marshal Kim Jong Un to the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state. 
					 On display there are a photo of Kim Jong Un standing on Mt. Paektu and photos showing his feats.
					
					 Photos including "Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Comrade Kim Jong Un lays a bouquet before the statues of the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung and the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il at the headquarters of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force and makes bows" showed the revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 There are photos dealing with iron will, matchless courage and outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un who defends the security of the country and people with his indefatigable Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 There are also photos telling about the leadership of Kim Jong Un who ushers in a greatest heyday of the youth power for the first time in the world and puts the country on the peak of scientific and technological power, true to the intention of the President and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also displayed there are photos dealing with the great personality of Kim Jong Un who produces miracles in the forced march for ceaseless field guidance and demonstrates the dignity and might of Juche Korea to the whole world.
					
					 There are also photos showing the appearance of the country whose looks have undergone a dramatic change and the happy life of the Korean people.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, officials concerned, officials of ministries and national institutions and working people in the city.

articles.title: Trees Planted at Mongolian Embassy
articles.content:
Trees Planted at Mongolian Embassy
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- There took place a tree-planting at the Mongolian embassy here on Wednesday to mark the 60th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's visit to Mongolia and the 95th anniversary of the victory of the Mongolian people's revolution.
					 Present there were a vice-chairman of the DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Association, other officials concerned, the charge d' affaires ad interim and staff member of the Mongolian embassy.
					
					 They planted pine-nut trees reflecting the will to boost the friendly relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here on Wednesday visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 They visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum where the historical data and relics showing the revolutionary activities of the President and his family members are on display.
					
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and the noble careers of his family members at the old home in Mangyongdae, the guests went round historical relics.
					
					 On the same day the guests toured the remodeled Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace.

articles.title: Educational Achievements Made at Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Educational Achievements Made at Kim Il Sung University
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Il Sung University in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is now taking the lead in making a revolution in education.
					 The university has made significant achievements in a work to improve the teaching methods and educational conditions and environment in 40 days after the start of the 70-day campaign in the country.
					
					 Ninety-six advanced teaching methods were invented in recent one week and at least 17,800 teaching plans in hundreds of subjects were put on a practical, comprehensive and modern basis. And a work is progressing at the final stage to make more than 40,000 e-teaching programs.
					
					 Educators in the social sciences developed a new support program for education in the revolutionary history, which stores huge amount of data including the works of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Meanwhile, a computer-aided examination system for hundreds of subjects was completed and scores of kinds of experimental equipment and appliances were manufactured.
					
					 The university also created much more generating capacity with use of natural energy to put its administration on an IT basis and keep the operation of tele-education system and educational information system on a regular basis.
					
					 Its general goal is to implement the tasks set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in August Juche 103 (2014) to bring about a drastic turn in education in the new century.

articles.title: Preparations for Kimilsungia Festival Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Preparations for Kimilsungia Festival Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Preparations for the 18th Kimilsungia Festival are making headway in the DPRK.
					 The festival will begin from mid-April with the attendance of armed forces organs, commissions, ministries, national institutions, working people of various strata, school youth and children, the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and other overseas Korean organizations, overseas Koreans and foreigners.
					
					 The theme of the festival is "Kimilsungia in full bloom wishing eternal prosperity of the great era of Kim Jong Un".
					
					 A work to decorate the festival venue is now under way.
					
					 According to an official concerned, an increasing number of citizens have made applications for the festival and preparations for Kimilsungia shows are in rapid progress in local areas.
					
					 The 1st festival took place in Juche 88 (1999).

articles.title: Efforts for National Reconciliation and Unity
articles.content:
Efforts for National Reconciliation and Unity
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung made public the famous work "10-point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" on April 6, Juche 82 (1993). 
					 The work expounds the unique idea of great national unity, the keynote of which the entire nation should get united by putting requirements and interests common to the nation above anything else.
					
					 In the new century, too, the DPRK government, pursuant to Kim Il Sung's idea of great national unity, remains unchanged in its stand to have open-minded talks with those desirous of national reconciliation and unity, peace and reunification. 
					
					 Thanks to leader Kim Jong Il's fraternity and bold decision, two rounds of north-south summits took place in Pyongyang and the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration were adopted.
					
					 In the days of implementing the north-south declarations, the north and the south had ministerial talks and other multi-faceted contacts and dialogues, in order to promote cooperation and exchange in various fields such as economy, culture, sports, healthcare and environment. 
					
					 Air and sea routes were opened and railroad and road, interrupted for over half a century, reconnected between the north and the south.
					
					 Under the leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, the DPRK makes strenuous efforts to improve the north-south relations on the basis of the Three Principles of National Reunification, north-south declarations and other agreements made between the north and the south.
					
					 In a speech made at the military parade to celebrate the 100th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Un said that the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government will join hands with anyone who truly wants the reunification of the country and the peace and prosperity of the nation and make responsible and patient efforts to accomplish the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					 Last year when a complicated situation lingered on the Korean Peninsula, the DPRK had made a series of epoch-making proposals and taken important measures in order to put an end to mistrust and confrontation between the north and the south and bring about a great turn and great change in inter-Korean relations.
					
					 It is the principled stand of the DPRK to deter all challenges of the anti-reunification forces and open a way for improved inter-Korean relations in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il's Exploits
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il's Exploits
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was the peerlessly great man who laid the eternal foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean revolution with his brilliant far-sightedness, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in an article.
					 Referring to his immortal exploits, the article goes on:
					
					 From the early period of his leadership, Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul to develop the WPK into the party of the leader, Juche-oriented revolutionary party, both in name and in reality.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism and made it to shine as the great guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 In particular, he developed the President's idea of attaching importance to the army into the Songun revolutionary idea and theory of Songun politics, put forward the theory for building a thriving socialist nation and thus radically raised the attraction and vitality of Kimilsungism.
					
					 In the whole period of leading the revolution he regarded believing in the people as in Heaven as his motto and developed the WPK into the party representing and protecting the wishes and interests of the popular masses and the motherly party which has close bonds with them deeply rooted among them.
					
					 Setting the strengthening of the Korean People's Army as the primary important affair in the Songun revolution, he developed the Korean revolutionary armed forces into a matchless revolutionary army distinct in revolutionary character and strong in militant spirit.
					
					 Holding high the banner of Songun in the 1990s, he turned the revolutionary armed forces into the politico-ideologically strong invincible army and a-match-for-a-hundred army and the DPRK into an impregnable fortress.
					
					 He developed the nation's defence industry into the Paektusan arsenal capable of manufacturing modern military equipment and combat and technical means as it wished.
					
					 The DPRK has become a satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state, demonstrating the might of the great Paektusan nation. This is the precious fruition of the undying Songun revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: U.S. Will Get Only Disgrace and Ruin in Military Stand-off with DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Will Get Only Disgrace and Ruin in Military Stand-off with DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- It is a daydream of the U.S. to launch a war through surprise preemptive attack by special warfare troops and seize it.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an article.
					
					 The U.S. will get only disgrace and destruction in military stand-off with the DPRK, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Tragedy is that the present Obama administration is not wakening from the daydream.
					
					 The U.S. is making desperate efforts, being engrossed in the last hopeless gambling.
					
					 The DPRK regards this as bluffing of a weak.
					
					 If there is a sign of a slight movement against the DPRK, it will make a prompt powerful and merciless preemptive attack on the land of the U.S., cesspool of evils, and wipe it off the surface of the earth.
					
					 Deep regret would come late when the U.S. will be aware of the serious consequences to be entailed by its misunderstandings and misjudgments of the DPRK.
					
					 Warning Washington once again, it had better stop such foolish act as jumping into fire with faggot on its back.
					
					 Striking means of the DPRK aiming at the citadel of aggression show no mercy.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Forces' Occupation of S. Korea Illegal
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Forces' Occupation of S. Korea Illegal
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Chinese Huan Qiu Shibao carried an article titled "The illegal U.S.-south Korea 'mutual defense treaty'" written by the director of the institute for military law of a Chinese university. The writer asserted in an article that the U.S.-south Korea "mutual defense treaty" is a direct threat to world peace and security as it is the illegal one which abused the right of collective self-defense stipulated in the UN Charter.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says that there is some sense in the assertion and a lot of foreign scholars have shared similar views with the assertion since long ago.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 In view of the Korean Armistice Agreement and the 51st article of the UN Charter, the U.S.-south Korea "mutual defense treaty" is the abuse of the right of collective self-defense and open challenge to it.
					
					 The U.S. forces' occupation of south Korea should not be allowed to continue any longer as it is illegal.
					
					 Korea has undergone sufferings resulting from division and its people have not lived in peace as the U.S. has kept its forces in south Korea for more than a half century.
					
					 The U.S. forces in south Korea are to blame for all sorts of crimes such as murder, rape and robbery there and they are also to blame the root cause of ceaseless confrontation between the fellow countrymen on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have staged illegal nuclear war drills with the south Korean puppet forces every year in a bid to inflict a nuclear disaster upon the Korean people.
					
					 The U.S. forces' occupation of south Korea and their moves for igniting a nuclear war are becoming the root cause of putting the U.S. mainland at peril.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to admit the illegality of its forces' occupation of south Korea and withdraw them from it in time.
					
					 Doing so would do the U.S. good either

articles.title: Minju Joson Criticizes Park Geun Hye for Talking Rubbish against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Criticizes Park Geun Hye for Talking Rubbish against DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye of south Korea, who flew to the U.S. to participate in the "Nuclear Security Summit" sponsored by her U.S. master, spouted a litany of rubbish against the DPRK wherever she went.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday in a commentary terms this a scream of a poor old confrontation maniac on her deathbed.
					
					 Park is more dead than alive as she is being cursed and censured by all Koreans for masterminding the hideous criminal acts to dare get the sun eclipsed.
					
					 Her regime is now at a loss after receiving the ultimatum sent by the long-range artillery force of the large combined frontline unit of the Korean People's Army in the wake of its intensive firing drill to wipe out the Chongwadae and other reactionary ruling machines in Seoul.
					
					 Like a drowning woman catching at a straw, what Park uttered is no more than a last-ditch attempt of a confrontation maniac fear-stricken by the might of the DPRK countering the moves of the hostile forces with toughest military measures.
					
					 Park has no future and she is fated to meet an unimaginably miserable end.
					
					 The DPRK keeps tabs on all the crimes she had committed and the day is sure to come when she has to pay dearly for them.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities for Paving Way for Japan's Reinvasion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities for Paving Way for Japan's Reinvasion
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- At the request of the south Korean puppet forces, the chairman of Japan's maritime "Self-Defence Force" flew to south Korea and held a confab with the naval chief of staff of south Korea recently under the pretext of "discussing the proposal for reenergizing exchange".
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary terms this an act of treachery paving the way for reinvasion by Japan, the sworn enemy of the nation.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the collusion and nexus with the Japanese militarist forces watching for a chance of reinvasion would entail catastrophic consequences, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 It is quite natural for the south Korean people from all walks of life to express irrepressible indignation at the behavior of the Park Geun Hye group of traitors working hard with their sleeves rolled up to knock into shape the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military alliance aimed to invade the north while covering up Tokyo's past crimes.
					
					 No matter what rhetoric the puppet group may spout to justify its treacherous acts while talking about "reenergizing the exchange", no one will be taken in by it.
					
					 The south Korean people can never escape the disgrace and insult nor can the Korean nation get rid of the danger of a nuclear war as long as such group of traitors is allowed to encourage Japan in its ambition for militarist reinvasion, far from letting them make an apology and reparation for the past crimes.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group deserves the severest punishment as it makes no scruple of committing any treacherous acts to do harm to compatriots.

articles.title: Minju Joson Lashes out at Japanese Reactionaries' Moves for Militarist Overseas Expansion
articles.content:
Minju Joson Lashes out at Japanese Reactionaries' Moves for Militarist Overseas Expansion
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries have enforced the "security legislation" providing for the exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" since March 29.
					 Minju Joson on Wednesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This shows that the Japanese reactionaries' ambition for overseas aggression has already gone beyond the limit and control.
					
					 Japan is a criminal war state which invaded Asian countries including Korea in the past, bringing immeasurable misfortune and sufferings to the peoples in this region.
					
					 It remains unchanged in its ambition for invading Asian countries and emerging "a leader" of the region.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries, availing themselves of the US imperialists' Asian strategy, have worked hard to eliminate all political and institutional mechanisms obstructive to gaining the right to fight a war and rush headlong into militarist overseas expansion. They are now carrying out this scenario.
					
					 Japan put into force the new "security legislation", accusing others under this situation. Its crafty artifice is sparking off the disgust of all people.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are rushing headlong into militarization, vowing to take revenge for its defeat under the mask of "pacifist state." These war drumbeats are adversely affecting the security environment of Asia.
					
					 Japan should not miscalculate.
					
					 Its ever more undisguised moves for militarization would throw the country into a bottomless pitfall of self-destruction.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should properly understand the will of the international community and stop at once their moves for launching reckless militarist overseas expansion.

articles.title: KCNA Accuses Park Geun Hye Group of Punishing Patriot
articles.content:
KCNA Accuses Park Geun Hye Group of Punishing Patriot
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Park Geun Hye group of traitors demanded 15 years in prison for Kim Ki Jong, representative of the Uri Madang, who made knife attack on the U.S. ambassador to south Korea in protest against the extremely dangerous U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean peninsula.
					 This fascist action prompted by traitor Park's inborn bad habit of standing in confrontation with compatriots was a fascist crackdown aimed at cementing the ruling foundation for reviving the "yusin" dictatorship by backing the U.S. colonial rule and provocations against the DPRK and creating extreme uneasiness and terror-ridden atmosphere in the south Korean society.
					
					 The above-said attack on the U.S. ambassador to south Korea is an eruption of the pent-up grudge and resentment of the south Korean people against the U.S. which has not only brought untold suffering and misfortune to them but also got frantic with drills for igniting a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula for more than a half century after occupying south Korea by force of arms.
					
					 However, Park, faithful running dog of the U.S., heard this news during her junket to the Middle East, and termed the incident "attack on the south Korea-U.S. alliance".
					
					 As soon as she returned home, she visited the U.S. ambassador and behaved slavishly before him, uttering that "she was also attacked by a knife once" and "she got the same wound and was admitted to the same hospital" and the happening "provided an occasion of making the bilateral relations closer." 
					
					 Not content with branding the incident as "terrorism", she cried out for "eliminating the force behind the scene", deliberately linking it with the north. The "government" authorities and prosecution, police, conservative media and ultra-right organizations ran wild with a wholesale campaign for "eliminating followers of the north" and "witch hunt", pursuant to her order.
					
					 This was, indeed, despicable sycophancy and treachery of the group of traitors and the hysteric fit of those obsessed with confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 What Kim Ki Jong did deserves admiration of all people as it reflected the mindset of the south Korean public which denounced the U.S. war maniacs who posed a serious threat to peace and security on the Korean peninsula and blocked national reunification through their nuclear war drills targeting the DPRK.
					
					 The Park group of traitors' act of demanding heavy penalty for the fair-minded south Korean by labeling him "an anti-U.S. element" and "terrorist" is the worst act as treachery punishes patriotism.
					
					 Such reality in which action against war and the U.S. is incriminated and just revenge-seekers are branded as criminals goes to clearly prove that the Park group is, indeed, the U.S. war servants and hordes of traitors hell-bent on the confrontation with fellow compatriots.
					
					 It is Park Geun Hye who should be punished by the nation for bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the land of Korea while keeping the U.S. aggression forces in south Korea for an indefinite period.
					
					 As long as the puppet group works hard to quell the south Korean people's anti-U.S. and anti-war sentiment, the second and third Kim Ki Jong will appear to mete out severer punishment to the U.S. imperialist aggressors and the puppet group.
					
					 The south Korean people from all walks of life should bring down the society where the traitors punish the patriots as soon as possible and mete out a stern punishment to Park Geun Hye hell-bent on the war drills targeting the DPRK in collusion with outsiders.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Stage Anti-DPRK Mobile Strike Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Stage Anti-DPRK Mobile Strike Drill
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet army and navy staged a mobile strike drill in the area of Kosong, south Korean Kangwon Province on April 4, according to Yonhap News and MBC of south Korea.
					 The drill involved all sorts of automatic guns, MLRS, drones, anti-artillery radars of the three corps of artillery units on the east front including the 8th Corps of south Korean puppet army and patrol crafts, guided-missile high-speed warships and other fire-strike means of its navy.
					
					 The south Korean warmongers massively fired shells at the sea under the simulated conditions of someone's infiltration.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Raps Authorities' Suppression of Teachers Trade Union
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Raps Authorities' Suppression of Teachers Trade Union
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Minjok Ilbo on April 4 in an editorial denounced the puppet group's suppressive action to stifle the teachers trade union.
					 The editorial said that the bank transactions of the Teachers Union (Jongyojo) were checked and the full-time officials of the organization are in the danger of being discharged for refusing to return to their former jobs due to the moves of the Ministry of Education.
					
					 It stressed that even the International Labour Organization demanded several times the withdrawal of the action of outlawing Jongyojo but the present regime does not accept it.

articles.title: Koreans in China Slam U.S. Imperialists and south Korean Regime's Hideous Provocation
articles.content:
Koreans in China Slam U.S. Imperialists and south Korean Regime's Hideous Provocation 
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Officials of the organizations of the Koreans in China issued statements denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group for driving the situation on the Korean peninsula to the dangerous and hair-trigger line of explosion while resorting to the heinous provocative act of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 The chief of the Dalian City Branch of the Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on April 1 accused the U.S. imperialists and puppet group of traitors of making desperate efforts to disable the DPRK's nuclear deterrent while staging the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 against the latter, reckless provocation against its supreme headquarters.
					
					 The chairman of the Jiamusi Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on the same day denounced the U.S. and Park Geun Hye group's heinous "beheading operation" and moves for "bringing down the social system" of the DPRK as the height of hostile acts against it.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Mudanjiang Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on March 30 urged the U.S. and south Korean warmongers to immediately stop their reckless moves for igniting a war against the DPRK to harass peace on the Korean peninsula and inflict a nuclear disaster upon the Korean nation.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Newspaper Calls for Bringing down Park Geun Hye Regime
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Newspaper Calls for Bringing down Park Geun Hye Regime
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Minjok Sibo, the newspaper of Koreans published in Japan, carried an article titled "Park Geun Hye regime sells off national interests" on April 1.
					 It admits of no argument that the Park regime is the worst one in history of south Korea, the article said, and went on:
					
					 It pursued the worst policies such as concluding the humiliating "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, staging the south Korea-U.S. joint military drills and shutting down the Kaesong Industrial Zone. The U.S. is the wire-puller of such policies. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye demanded the north's unilateral nuclear dismantlement at the instruction of the U.S., making the issue more serious and has sought "unification through absorption" aimed to "disintegrate the north" without a will to implement the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The article called for pulling down cancer-like Park Geun Hye from her post as early as possible for the sake of the country and the nation.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Carried by Namibian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Carried by Namibian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was carried by the Namibian newspaper New Era on March 30.
					 The newspaper illustrated a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Kuwait
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Kuwait
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was brought out in booklet by the Kuwait Times on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the building of the Kuwait Times on March 28.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed by Russian Newspapers
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed by Russian Newspapers
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers dedicated special write-ups to the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The 11th issue of Konkurent devoted one whole page to an article titled "Eternal sun" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung and his photos.
					
					 The newspaper said that April 15, birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, is the Day of the Sun.
					
					 Not only the Korean people but also the progressives celebrate the Day of the Sun with splendor every year, it noted, and went on:
					
					 He founded the Juche idea and thus illuminated the road to be covered by mankind.
					
					 He positively supported and encouraged the peoples of a lot of countries in their struggle for the anti-imperialist national liberation and the building of a new society with broad magnanimity and internationalist obligation.
					
					 Though he passed away, his idea and exploits are shedding more bright rays and he is alive in the hearts of all people as the sun of Juche.
					
					 The April issue of Serp I Molot in an article illustrated with his photo praised him for building and leading the state.
					
					 The March 30th issue of Rio Panorama carried an article titled "Scientists streets in Pyongyang" accompanied with a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Nakhodkinski Rabochi on March 29 allotted one whole page to an article titled "Leader's priority issue" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung and photos of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried special write-ups on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The March issue of the China Hong Kong magazine International Link carried articles illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung and photos of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The magazine said in an article titled "Peerlessly great man":
					
					 HE Kim Il Sung was the eternal President of the DPRK and the greatest man of the 20th century.
					
					 He made an immortal contribution to the cause of human independence.
					
					 He also conducted energetic activities for strengthening the socialist movement and the non-aligned movement.
					
					 He was the incarnation of human love possessed of boundlessly noble virtues.
					
					 The March 24th issue of the DR Congo newspaper L'Avenir in articles illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung introduced his ideological, theoretical and party and state building exploits.
					
					 The March 30th issue of the Namibian newspaper New Era carried articles under various titles such as "Smile of the sun" and "Kim Il Sung, eternal sun" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung" and his photos.

articles.title: Joint Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Belarus
articles.content:
Joint Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Belarus
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- A joint preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated in Belarus on March 10.
					 Five figures including L. Shukolinikov, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus who doubles as chairman of the Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, were elected co-chairpersons of the preparatory committees.
					
					 The committee decided to send a congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un on major occasions and hold functions to praise the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 It also decided to give wide publicity to the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and successes being registered by the Korean people in building a thriving socialist nation and accomplishing the cause of national reunification.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Chile
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Chile
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- A Chilean special committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed on March 31.
					 Manuel Arismendi, representative of the Chilean Branch of the Korean Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the special committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize events such as a seminar and film show and give wide publicity to the DPRK's reality where human rights are being successfully ensured on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear Threat to DPRK Blamed by Peruvian Political Figures
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear Threat to DPRK Blamed by Peruvian Political Figures
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, and Cati Campos Rontop, general secretary of the front, issued a joint statement on March 31 in denunciation of the U.S. nuclear threat to the DPRK.
					 The statement stated:
					
					 The U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK have lasted for more than half a century.
					
					 The U.S. stages the large-scale joint military exercises with south Korea by involving huge aggression forces every year and has prepared for a nuclear strike at the DPRK.
					
					 However, the invincible DPRK has bolstered up its military muscle in every way by dint of the might of Songun and thus resolutely smashed the U.S. nuclear threat.
					
					 We fully support the DPRK's stance for coping with the U.S. moves for aggression.

articles.title: DPRK Is Peace-Loving Nation: Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK Is Peace-Loving Nation: Brazilian Organization
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted on its website a poster showing the single-minded unity of the Korean army and people and an article supporting the DPRK's just cause on March 28.
					 The article said:
					
					 The DPRK is better aware of the value of peace than others as it was subject to invasion and has been exposed to war threat by foreign forces for a long time.
					
					 It never wants a war but ardently aspires after the world denuclearization.
					
					 However, from the fates of Iraq and Libya, it was convinced that it could safeguard the country's sovereignty and dignity and defend the destiny of the country and people only when it had access to the creditable nuclear deterrent along with the powerful military muscle.
					
					 Under such situation it was compelled to have access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. has intensified the pressure on the DPRK while denying the latter's access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 To cope with it, the DPRK had access to even H-bomb.
					
					 The world should understand that though the DPRK ranked itself among the advanced nuclear weapons states, it will never be a country which will use them first.
					
					 The DPRK is a peace-loving nation.

articles.title: CC de PTC felicita 69o aniversario de fundacion de BAAS
articles.content:
CC de PTC felicita 69o aniversario de fundacion de BAAS
Pyongyang, 6 de abril (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio el dia 6 un mensaje de felicitacion a la direccion nacional del Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe (BAAS), con motivo del 69o aniversario de la fundacion de esta organizacion politica.
					La misiva formula votos por nuevos exitos en la lucha del partido y el pueblo arabe por defender la soberania, la seguridad y la integridad territorial bajo la direccion del Presidente Bashar al-Assad y expresa la conviccion de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre el PTC y el BAAS se fortalezcan y se desarrollen invariablemente tambien en el futuro.

articles.title: Portavoz del IDP del MINREX de RPDC revela ilegalidad de "Tratado de Defensa Mutua" EE.UU.-Surcorea
articles.content:
Portavoz del IDP del MINREX de RPDC revela ilegalidad de "Tratado de Defensa Mutua" EE.UU.-Surcorea
Pyongyang, 6 de abril (ACNC) -- EE.UU. anuncia como si la ocupacion del Sur de Corea por las tropas norteamericanas y los ejercicios militares conjuntos son "legitimos" de acuerdo con el "Tratado de Defensa Mutua" y el mismo "cumpliera" el Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea.
					El portavoz del Instituto de Desarme y Paz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en una declaracion fechada 6 revela que esto no pasa de ser un disparate y una artimana astuta para encubrir la naturaleza agresiva de EE.UU. y enganar a la opinion publica mundial.
					
					El mismo "Tratado de Defensa Mutua" EE.UU.-Surcorea, que el pais primero toma como fundamento para la "legitimidad" de los simulacros militares conjuntos, es el documento ilegal diametralmente opuesto al Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea, adelanta la nota y prosigue:
					
					El Acuerdo de Armisticio cabe un articulo, segun lo cual hay que convocar una reunion politica dentro de 3 meses despues que el acuerdo surta su validez y discutir los asuntos tales como la retirada de Corea de todas las tropas extranjeras y la solucion pacifica del problema coreano.
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. aprobo el "Tratado de Defensa Mutua" con los titeres surcoreanos antes de que se cumpliera el plazo de convocacion de la reunion politica mencionada en el Acuerdo de Armisticio.
					
					Asi EE.UU. violo el Acuerdo de Armisticio, fijo la ocupacion militar sobre el Sur de Corea y ha venido realizando de manera constante los ejercicios militares conjuntos con los titeres surcoreanos persiguiendo la agresion armada contra la RPDC.
					
					El hecho no es una simple violacion del articulo nuclear del Acuerdo de Armisticio, que estipula parar por completo las acciones hostiles de todo tipo contra la contraparte hasta que se logre la solucion pacifica del problema coreano, sino la quiebra completa del acuerdo y abierta declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC. 
					
					EE.UU. niega obstinadamente la propuesta de la RPDC por la concertacion del convenio de paz, lo cual deviene el acto ilegal que contraviene gravemente no solo al articulo referente a la solucion pacifica del problema coreano, objeto del Acuerdo de Armisticio, sino tambien al proposito y principio de la Carta de la ONU que estipularon la resolucion pacifica del conflicto internacional que puede ocasionar la destruccion de la paz.
					
					El imperio persigue el objetivo de mantener invariablemente el "Tratado de Defensa Mutua" concertado con los titeres surcoreanos y tomarlo como base juridica para realizar la hegemonica estrategia Asia-Pacifico poniendo toda la Peninsula Coreana bajo su dominacion.
					
					Resulta muy obstinada la insistencia de EE.UU. en que el incremento de sus fuerzas armadas y los ejercicios conjuntos militares en el Sur de Corea se necesitan para proteger en el "tiempo de emergencia" las tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en el suelo surcoreano.
					
					Si EE.UU. se preocupa verdaderamente de las perdidas de las tropas norteamericanas que se produjeran en caso de estallar la guerra en Corea, seria mejor retirar todas sus fuerzas armadas.
					
					Si se desaparezcan las tropas norteamericanas, se eliminara el origen del peligro de guerra y se lograra el ambiente pacifico en la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					
					Pero, no hay actualmente ningun dispositivo institucional para impedir la guerra termonuclear en esta peninsula, sino se intensifica mas la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. contra la RPDC.
					
					Frente a la grave situacion creada, la RPDC consolidara con mas firmeza en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo el disuasivo nuclear y ejercera dignamente su merecido derecho autodefensivo del Estado soberano.
					
					Los imprudentes simulacros nucleares de EE.UU. devienen actos estupidos y autodestructivos.

articles.title: Inaugurada exposicion nacional de fotos
articles.content:
Inaugurada exposicion nacional de fotos
Pyongyang, 6 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo iniciada la exposicion nacional de fotos "Gran abnegacion por la defensa de la patria y el amor al pueblo", con motivo del 4o aniversario del nombramiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el puesto cimero del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Estado.
					En la galeria del acto estaban expuestas la foto con imagen del Mariscal encontrandose en el monte Paektu, y las otras alusivas a sus proezas.
					
					"Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del EPC, rindiendo tributo al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il tras depositar un ramo de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce erigidas en la comandancia de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC" y otras fotos hacen recordar los dias de la direccion sobre la revolucion del Mariscal.
					
					Hay tambien las fotos alusivas a la ferrea voluntad, la audacia incomparable y el liderazgo extraordinario del Mariscal quien defiende la seguridad de la patria y la salud del pueblo con su direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					
					Se ven ademas las que transmiten la direccion del Mariscal quien continuando los propositos de los grandes lideres, abrio una era dorada de la potencia de la juventud y orienta a hacerse la potencia de las ciencias y tecnicas.
					
					Tambien se distinguen las fotografias referentes a la grandeza del Mariscal quien pone de manifiestos la dignidad y el gallardo aspecto de la Corea del Juche creando los milagros nunca vistos en el periodo de la marcha penosa por la direccion sobre el terreno.
					
					Se ven las fotos alusivas al aspecto de la patria transformandose con alta velocidad y a la vida feliz del pueblo coreano.
					
					La ceremonia de inauguracion de la exposicion nacional de fotos tuvo lugar el dia 6 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo con la participacion de Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, los funcionarios de ramas correspondientes, ministerios y organos centrales, asi como trabajadores en esta capital.

articles.title: ACNC rechaza represion a Kim Ki Jong en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC rechaza represion a Kim Ki Jong en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 6 de abril (ACNC) -- La banda traidora surcoreana de Park Geun-hye propuso una pena de 15 anos de prision a Kim Ki Jong, representante de Uri Madang quien dio sablazos de justicia al embajador estadounidense acreditado en el Sur de Corea en senal de protesta a los ejercicios belicos conjuntos Estados Unidos-Sur de Corea que acarrean un nubarron de la guerra nuclear a la Peninsula Coreana. 
					Esto es la expresion del vicio innato de la traidora Park Geun-hye, colmada de la conciencia fratricida, y la violencia fascista a fin de apoyar la dominacion colonial y las maniobras provocativas anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y establecer el firme fundamento de dominacion favorable a la resucitacion de la dictadura de "Yusin" mediante la creacion del ambiente de panico y temor en la sociedad surcoreana. 
					
					El caso de sablazos es la explosion de la colera arraigada de la poblacion surcoreana contra EE.UU. que al ocupar con armas el territorio surcoreano durante mas de medio siglo, impone incontables sufrimientos y desgracias a los habitantes surcoreanos y recurre a los freneticos ejercicios de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Sin embargo, la pronorteamericana Park Geun-hye, que en el dia del incidente estaba de visita en el Medio Oriente, lo califico de "ataque a la alianza Sur de Corea-EE.UU."
					
					Tan pronto como regresara al Sur de Corea, visito al embajador norteamericano hospitalizado y actuo con villania diciendo que ella tambien "habia sufrido el sablazo semejante y estuvo en el mismo hospital" y que "se ha preparado un motivo para estrechar las relaciones Sur de Corea-EE.UU."
					
					Califico de "terror" el incidente y ordeno "eliminar las fuerzas de mando trasero" vinculandolo injustamente con la RPDC. En adhesion a la traidora Park, las autoridades "gubernamentales" y los sirvientes del poder como la fiscalia, la policia, los medios de prensa conservadores y las entidades ultraderechistas del Sur de Corea se entregaron a la campana de eliminacion de "fuerzas pro-Norte" y a la "caza de bruja". 
					
					Es una histerica locura vendepatria y pronorteamericana. 
					
					La conducta de Kim Ki Jong fue una accion de justicia a ser aplaudida por todo el mundo y refleja el sentimiento de la poblacion surcoreana contra EE.UU. que amenaza gravemente la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana e impide la reunificacion de la patria librando los ejercicios de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC.
					
					Sin embargo, la camarilla traidora de Park Geun-hye condeno la pena dura al morador justiciero tildandole de "hombre antiyanqui" y "terrorista". 
					
					Esto significa que la traicion a la patria sentencia el patriotismo. 
					
					Como vemos, en la sociedad surcoreana se consideran como crimenes las acciones contra los yanquis y la guerra y por la paz y se tildan de criminales los vengadores justicieros. 
					
					La realidad demuestra claramente que la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye es la de sirvientes de guerra de EE.UU. y maniacos de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Park Geun-hye es la criminal a ser castigada por la nacion.
					
					Cuanto mas los traidores surcoreanos se desesperen por frenar el clima antiyanqui y anti-guerra de la poblacion surcoreana, tanto mas se aumentaran el numero de vengadores como Kim Ki Jong. 
					
					Los habitantes surcoreanos deben revolcar cuanto antes la sociedad injusta y sentenciar a la traidora Park Geun-hye que recurre a los ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC en adhesion a las fuerzas extranjeras.
